NATAL CARE TO MOTHERS AND NEWBORNS 
Timing of discharge from the health facility 
RECOMMENDATION 1
After an uncomplicated vaginal birth in a health facility, healthy mothers and newborns 
should receive care in the facility for at least 24 hours after birth. 
— Weak recommendation, based on low quality evidence
